summary: The boys return from jail to find the park has deteriorated, with a brand new park being created beside it. They attempt a series of get rich quick schemes and robberies, while a freshly drunk Lahey threatens to derail their plans.
cast: Robb Wells|John Paul Tremblay|Mike Smith|John Dunsworth|Jonathan Torrens|Patrick Roach|Lucy Decoutere|Sarah Dunsworth|Barrie Dunn|Tyrone Parsons|Jeanna Harrison|Richard Collins|Jacob Rolfe|Alex Lifeson|Brian Vollmer|Mary Fay Coady|Mary-Colin Chisholm|Andy Smith|Aliya-Jasmine Sovani|Sam Tarasco|Bernard Robichaud|Jim Swansburg|George Green|Nobu Adilman|Mio Adilman|Darcy Fraser|Alexander Rosborough|Don Ritchie|Jim Lindsey|Michael Gaudet|Chuck O'Hara|Kevin Reade|Todd Godin|Mike Chandler|Scott Owen|Scott Everett Baker|Ken Shipley|Ken Nugent|Ethan Kim|Richard Boudreau|David Wm. Marsh|Tracy Aarons|Kristopher Anderson|Don Bottomley|Andree de Villers|Ike The Dog|Joe the Dog|Gregory Richardson
title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
